Product Description

If you have problems losing things in your car seat gaps, the car seat organizer front seat storage box is for you. It not only prevents small items from falling between the seats but also gives you a place to put change, a pen, toll cards, and other necessary ‚Äòcar items‚Äô and keeps them within reach. It is well-constructed and easy to install. Safe and reliable.

High Quality

Made of premium top-class PU and ABS material which is durable and is impact resistant. Interior velvet material increases friction to keep items from sliding and rattling.

item.title: PetSafe Multi-Tier Pet Fountain ‚Äì Large Waterer Great for Cats and Dogs ‚Äì 2 Heights to Drink From ‚Äì Great for Senior Pets ‚Äì 100 Oz Water Capacity ‚Äì Fresh, Filtered Water

Pets love running water and are drawn to it. Pet fountains entice pets to drink more water which keeps them healthy and hydrated. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $41.99 - $29.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:10 UTC – Details)


Two tiers, two times the fun! The Multi-Tier Pet Fountain has an upper and lower bowl for your pet to drink from, keeping them happy and hydrated. Pets love running water and are drawn to it. Pet fountains entice pets to drink more water which keeps them healthy and hydrated. With this fountain, pets can drink from the flowing stream or from the bowl tiers (which is awesome) because your pet needs 1 ounce of water per 1 pound they weigh every day. The water constantly circulates which keeps things fresh and helps to promote good pet hygiene. The levels of this fountain make this great for pets of all sizes since they can drink water at a height that‚Äôs comfortable for them. This is especially great for senior pets, so they won‚Äôt have to bend down as much to drink from the upper tier. This fountain works hard to make sure your best friend will have fresh water. A carbon filter and fountain pump work together so your pet will always have clean water to drink. We‚Äôve made this fountain easy to clean ‚Äì simply place the fountain in the top rack of the dishwasher and hand wash the pump separately. Your pet deserves the best. Trust PetSafe to keep your pet healthy, safe and happy.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé No

GREAT FOR SENIOR PETS: The multi-tiered design of the fountain is great for senior or arthritic pets who can‚Äôt bend down to drink
ENCOURAGES HYDRATION: Falling water stream entices pets to drink more and helps support kidney health in pets through increased hydration
NO THIRSTY PETS: This fountain incorporates an open-bowl design so if your home loses power, your cat or dog will still have access to water
FRESH, FLOWING WATER: Replaceable carbon filter refreshes water and the foam filter catches pet hair and debris to keep your cat‚Äôs water clean
TOP-RACK DISHWASHER SAFE: Pet fountain is easy to keep clean, simply place it in the top rack of your dishwasher (excluding the fountain pump)
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Our pet product experts are here to help you and your pet and are available by phone, email or chat if you have any questions

Read more

Keep Your Pet Healthy and Hydrated

Let the fountain do the work!

Give your furry friend fresh, flowing water with the PetSafe Multi-Tier Pet Fountain. The falling water stream encourages your pet to drink more. The fountain features three places for your pets to drink from as well. Let us help keep your pet healthy and hydrated so you and your pet can live happy together.

A Company You Can Trust

  • Global brand in pet products for nearly 30 years
  • U.S.-based experts available Monday through Saturday
  • We help pets and their people live happy together!

Read more

Healthy Pet Lifestyle

No More Worry

The flowing stream and multiple drinking areas help encourage your pet to drink more, so they get the right amount of water each day to keep them healthy and hydrated.

No More Dirty Water

With the Multi-Tier pet fountain, your pet never has to drink dirty water again. The filters and constant water circulation helps keep the water fresh.

More Happy Moments

By keeping your pet hydrated, you and your pet can enjoy playtime more and live happy together.

More PetSafe Solutions for You and Your Pet Replacement Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the carbon keeps water fresh, making it more appealing to drink. Replacement Premium Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the segmented carbon compartments offer even carbon distribution while keeping water fresh. Multi-Tier Pet Fountain Replacement Pump can be used as a replacement or as a back-up pump during pump cleanings. Comes with 3 brushes. Great for cleaning your Multi-Tier Pet Fountain pump. The PetSafe ScoopFree Self-Cleaning Automatic Litter Box stays fresh and clean without the hassle of scooping. Feed your pet from anywhere with the PetSafe Smart Feed. Set your pet‚Äôs feeding schedule or give some snacks during the day through the smartphone app-enabled feeder.

3 Easy Steps to Clean the Pump

Take the Pump Apart

Remove & keep the blue face plate by using your finger to pull on the small tab on the side.

Remove the Stator

Remove & keep the blue teardrop shaped stator by pulling up on the small lip.

Remove the Impeller

Use a fingernail to pull out the impeller, which is held in place magnetically & keep it. Clean the pump parts with warm water and soap, then reassemble.
